description: etcd-demo sample Grafana dashboard with Prometheus

panels.description: overall request rate per minute over last 3 minutes
panels.title: Overall Request Rate

panels.description: percentage of HTTP status 5xx in all requests
panels.title: Overall Error Rate

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(duration_bucket{service_name="$app", span_name=~"$route", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[3m])) by (le, service_name, http_method, span_name))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(duration_bucket{service_name="$app", span_name=~"$route", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[3m])) by (le, service_name, http_method, span_name))

sum(duration_count{service_name="$app", span_name=~"$route", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_status_code!~"2.*|3.*"}) by(service_name, http_method, span_name) / sum(duration_count{service_name="$app", span_name=~"$route", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}) by(service_name, http_method, span_name)

sum(duration_count{service_name="$app", span_name=~"$route", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_status_code!~"2.*|3.*"}) by(service_name, http_method, span_name) / sum(duration_count{service_name="$app", span_name=~"$route", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}) by(service_name, http_method, span_name)

title: etcd demo
